issue.title: [Java] Add skip null check to all Vector types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8664](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8664). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-5290 added a flag to disable null checks in Vector get methods. However 

- DuractionVector
- FixedSizeBinaryVector
- TimeStampMicroTZVector
- TimeStampMicroVector
- TimeStampMilliTZVector
- TimeStampMilliVector
- TimeStampNanoTZVector
- TimeStampNanoVector
- TimeStampSecTZVector
- TimeStampSecVector
- VarCharVector
-  VarBinaryVector 
  
  were missed

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8664?focusedCommentId=17097556) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Please be sure to set the Component field and add "[$COMPONENT]" to the JIRA title (for the benefit of the changelog)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8664?focusedCommentId=17097900) by Ryan Murray (rymurr):*
apologies `[~wesm]` will do next time!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8664?focusedCommentId=17107911) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7095
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7095>
